name: Janitor Dan
description:
Janitor Dan is a game about a janitor named Brad. Run around a store flooded with customers as you try to be everywhere at once picking up all the trash the shoppers leave behind.

CONTROLS:
WASD to move

J when near cart to swap items

J when near trash to use items

K when near cart to pull cart

Esc to pause

Different items only clean certain types of trash. The broom removes dust, the trash bag and spike remove bottles and plastic wrapping, and the mop removes spills.

Made by: Tyler Johnson
